record.title: EXECUTIVE SESSION

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to executive session to consider Executive Calendar No. 255, R. Lyle Laverty to be Assistant Secretary for Fish and Wildlife; that the nomination be confirmed; the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table; the President be immediately notified of the Senate's action and the Senate then return to legislative session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The nomination considered and confirmed is as follows:
R. Lyle Laverty, of Colorado, to be Assistant Secretary for Fish and Wildlife.
